column6:
Luxury 1 bedroom/1 bath apartment in the heart of Downtown Dallas. Comes with full kitchen, wash & dryer(in unit), queen bed, Wifi, flat screen TV's with cable. Walking distance to shopping, dining, pick-up orders and convenience stores. Affordable Uber rates to nightlife an tourist attractions.

Building Amenities
*Rooftop Pool(6am-Midight)
*Community Area(6am-Midnight)
*4th Floor Atrium(6am-Midnight)
*Parking Garage(1 assigned spot)
*Elevators
*Mexican Restaurant
*Luxury Nail Spa(coming soon)
